price: 101. Мре tango bakobetaka to kofula kelelo, mokolo wana kibondeko ekozalaka te, mpe bakotunanaka mituna te.
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasāalūna
